    Interface and Description
    org.jgrapht.io.Attribute
    In favor of nio package.

    In favor of using lambdas.

    Use new importers.

    Use new importers.

    org.jgrapht.io.VertexProvider
    Use new importers.

    In favor of SimpleGraphMLImporter.

    Use VisioExporter instead.
